modName: Lost Paladins of the Divine Wrath - Shield and Vampire fix
summary: Bug fixes and moved for skyrim forge
descriptionHtml:
Changed ward effect to act while blocking; added vampire races to armours; moved forge location to skyforge to reduce clutter on regular forges & assist in immersion without quest.


Get the armor here! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24253/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24253/[/url]?



If a mod sees this, is it somehow possible to put this on the download page for "Lost Paladins of the Divines Wrath Armour" by Jerros? This mod applies as a bug fix for that mod only, and has no other purpose. Just want to share the fix for those who haven't figured out the Creation Kit yet :)

[b][i][u]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

[/u][/i][/b]Manual Installation: Copy the .esp file to your Skyrim/data folder so that it overwrites the .esp file from Lost Paladins of the Divines Wrath Armour
author: Mon3igh
